title: install pytorch in developer mode
body_html:
Hi, I'm trying to do some hack on the pytorch which might require a developer install. However, when I run python setup.py develop I got something like:

In file included from torch/csrc/utils/tuple_parser.cpp:1:0:
torch/csrc/utils/tuple_parser.h:6:23: fatal error: THPP/THPP.h: No such file or directory
#include <THPP/THPP.h>
^
The normal installation with python setup.py install works fine.

body:
Hi, I'm trying to do some hack on the pytorch which might require a developer install. However, when I run `python setup.py develop` I got something like:

> In file included from torch/csrc/utils/tuple_parser.cpp:1:0:
> torch/csrc/utils/tuple_parser.h:6:23: fatal error: THPP/THPP.h: No such file or directory
>  #include <THPP/THPP.h>
>                        ^
The normal installation with `python setup.py install` works fine.
